b  The World Health Organization (2012) lists direct causes of maternal death as hemorrhage, hypertensive diseases, abortion, sepsis or infections, obstructed 
labor, ectopic pregnancy, embolism, and anesthesia-related death. Not all causes were captured consistently by the four SMGL-supported districts.
